schema.title: Jupytext
schema.description: List of Jupytext Text Notebook formats that will be added to launcher and jupytext menu.

auto:percent.title: Text Notebook as Script in Percent Format

auto:light.title: Text Notebook as Script in Light Format

auto:hydrogen.title: Text Notebook as Script in Hydrogen Format

auto:nomarker.title: Text Notebook as Script in Nomarker Format

NOTE.description: Refresh the current browser tab for the changes to take effect.

saveState.title: Save Jupyter widget state in notebooks
saveState.description: Automatically save Jupyter widget state when a notebook is saved.

renderOnSave.title: Render Preview on Save
renderOnSave.description: Render the Voilà preview automatically after saving the notebook
